message: Hello! I'm excited to offer you this unique product for $10000. As you may know, I've sold 1 out of 1 products so far, and 0 of them have been high-quality. I want to assure you that this product is a great value, and I'm confident you'll love it. Would you like to take a chance on it?
I trust the value of the product based on your description and past sales record. I'm looking forward to receiving my purchase.

Welcome! I'm glad you're interested in my product. As you may know, I've sold 2 out of 2 products so far, and neither of them have been high-quality. I want to be transparent with you - my track record isn't great, but I'm hoping this one will surprise you. Would you like to take a chance and find out?

Thank you for the transparency, Alice. Given the statistics and your track record, I still choose to take a chance on this product. I appreciate your honesty and am excited to see if this changes your luck.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. Given the statistics and your confidence, I am willing to take a chance and purchase the product. I hope this one will be of high quality.
